alfredsnippet.snippet:
myfolder="{clipboard}"output_file="$myfolder/output.txt"echo "开始处理文件..."page_number=1for f in "$myfolder"/*; do        if [[ -f "$f" ]]; then                filename=$(basename "$f")        echo "正在处理: $filename"                        if tesseract "$f" stdout -l eng+jpn >> "$output_file"; then            echo "OCR处理成功并追加到输出文件: $filename"        else            echo "错误：OCR处理失败: $filename" >&2        fi                        echo "----- Page $page_number -----" >> "$output_file"        ((page_number++))    fidoneecho "所有文件处理完毕。"echo "结果已保存到 $output_file"echo "输出文件大小: $(wc -c < "$output_file") 字节"


#jpn#chi_sim#chi_sim
alfredsnippet.name: ocr
